scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:branch  && cp -R dist/* . && npm run deploy:clean && git add -A && git commit -a --no-gpg-sign -m 'gh-pages-update' && git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master
scripts.deploy:branch: git branch -f gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/master
scripts.build:fonts: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp src/fonts/*.ttf dist/fonts && ttf2woff src/fonts/Roboto-Light.ttf dist/fonts/Roboto-light.woff
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:images
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css && npm run watch:html
